NexmoSmsClient - Class in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk
NexmoSmsClient.java

Client for talking to the Nexmo REST interface

Usage To submit a message, first you should instanciate a NexmoSmsClient, passing the credentials for your Nexmo account on the constructor.
NexmoSmsClient(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.NexmoSmsClient
Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClient instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials.
NexmoSmsClient(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.NexmoSmsClient
Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClient instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials, and will use the supplied connection and read timeout values.
NexmoSmsClient(String, String, String, int, int, boolean, String, boolean) - Constructor for class com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.NexmoSmsClient
Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClient instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials, and will use the supplied connection and read timeout values.
Additionally, you can specify an alternative service base url.
NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests - Class in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk
NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests.java

Client for talking to the Nexmo REST interface that signs requests using a MD5 signature derived from a secret key

For usage information see NexmoSmsClient
NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests
Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials.

Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials, and will use the supplied connection and read timeout values.
NexmoSmsClientSignedRequestsSSL - Class in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk
NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests.java

Client for talking to the Nexmo REST interface that signs requests using a MD5 signature derived from a secret key, and that also uses a secure SSL / HTTPS connection to encrypt the requests

For usage information see NexmoSmsClient
NexmoSmsClientSignedRequestsSSL(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.NexmoSmsClientSignedRequestsSSL
Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials.

Instanciate a new NexmoSmsClientSignedRequests instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials, and will use the supplied connection and read timeout values.

NexmoSmsClientSSL.java
